basics.name: Sugra Baghirova
basics.summary: Fast-learning, motivated, teamwork-oriented, and responsible Data Analyst, with tech startup experience, website and software management expertise, combined with 5+ years of experience in sales and digital marketing. Well versed in presenting to executive staff and driving cross-functional collaboration across varied organizational subcultures, and global teams. Skilled in Python, Pandas, SQL, and data visualization tools such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, R and D3.js. In a short period of time, I was able to learn multiple front- and back-end computer programming languages and developed multiple research and analysis project websites and custom-built data scraping tools. I find great satisfaction in extracting, researching, analyzing, visualizing and manipulate data that inform decision-making and drive growth.

education.institution: International Prague University, Prague, Czech Republic

highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
